game.name: Dragon VS Icy Bricks
game.description: In the game Dragon vs Icy Bricks you are the dragon. On your way you will pass some blocks with numbers. You have to break them. If the number is more than your dragon, you will die. Your dragon can be longer by collecting numbers you will see on the way.
game.metaTitle: Dragon VS Icy Bricks Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Dragon VS Icy Bricks at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Dragon VS Icy Bricks Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON L-R OF SCREEN TO MOVE L-R
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE ON L-R OF SCREEN TO L-R
